header.title: wxColourPickerCtrl

description.p: This control allows the user to select a colour. The generic implementation is a button which brings up a wxColourDialog when clicked. Native implementation may differ but this is usually a (small) widget which give access to the colour-chooser dialog. It is only available if wxUSE_COLOURPICKERCTRL is set to 1 (the default).
